title: ibcrypto
author: ibcrypto
content: Did I understand, correctly, that  the release of Filecoin Virtual Machine will support Ethereum Smart Contracts and NFT's?  If so is that not a big deal?

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: I did think there was a hybrid solution that was missing though before now?As in a decentralised network that's able to store data or applications for a temporary amount of time and one that stores them straight on the blockchain (like having a lightning network equivelant with EVM compatibility).
